cmd: curl http://jim-lab.marathon.mesos/spark.jar -o /tmp/spark.jar; /opt/spark/dist/bin/spark-submit --master mesos://leader.mesos:5050 --conf spark.mesos.uris=http://api.hdfs.marathon.l4lb.thisdcos.directory/v1/endpoints/hdfs-site.xml,http://api.hdfs.marathon.l4lb.thisdcos.directory/v1/endpoints/core-site.xml  --proxy-user root --deploy-mode client --conf spark.executor.memory=8g --conf spark.executor.cores=4 --conf spark.cores.max=32 --conf driver.memory=8g --conf spark.network.timeout=10000000 --conf spark.mesos.executor.docker.image=mesosphere/spark:1.1.1-2.2.0-hadoop-2.6 --class com.lightbend.killrweather.app.KillrWeather /tmp/spark.jar
